00146                 public function colorful_license()
00147                 {
00148                         $color = '#69f';
00149                         switch ($this->license) {
00150                                 case 'free software':
00151                                         $color = '#f09'; // fuchsia
00152                                         break;
00153                                 case 'freeware':
00154                                         $color = '#0c0'; // green
00155                                         break;
00156                                 case 'shareware':
00157                                         $color = '#609'; // purple
00158                                         break;                          
00159                                 case 'commercial':
00160                                         $color = '#00c'; // blue
00161                                         break;                          
00162                                 case 'demo':
00163                                         $color = '#c00'; // red
00164                                         break;                          
00165                                 case 'donationware':
00166                                         $color = '#f93'; // orange
00167                                         break;                  
00168                         }
00169                         return span(ucwords($this->license), array('style' => "font-weight:bold;color:$color"));
00170                 }
